messages.messageBody:
I'd like that list please! Sorry, I don't have your private email. Then maybe I can learn more about what I am reading in these posts!!

Thanks,
Lori

From: Alan Bale
To: Study Group
Sent: Tuesday, April 05, 2005 4:46 AM
Subject: [nihontostudy] JAPANESE SWORD BOOKS SALE


30% OFF ALL BOOKS ON MY 'USED BOOK LIST' UNTIL THE END OF APRIL, MOST ARE SINGLE COPIES SO HURRY. IF YOU DON'T HAVE MY LIST EMAIL ME FOR ONE.

ALAN BALE
